title: Fierce Daddy
description: She'd lived her entire life in the shadows...All Tabby had ever really known from men was violence, pain, and betrayal.So she really shouldn’t trust the smooth-talking, older Razor, with his huge heart and fierce protective streak.Only, she can’t seem to resist him. His sweet words. Calm dominance. And lord, what that man could do with his tongue . . .When Tabby finds herself once more a pawn in a game she didn’t know she was playing, will Razor be able to save her?Or this time, will she save herself?Please note this book contains elements of ageplay. It includes spanking and a protective, possessive hero who won't give up on his girl, even when she already has.Tabby's past is dark and includes abuse. Please read the trigger warning before reading.
author: Laylah Roberts
